Package Application.Tools

Class ActiveTrade

java.lang.Object
Application.Tools.ActiveTrade
public class ActiveTrade
extends java.lang.Object
ActiveTrade: Is the GUI representation of an OnlineTrade object.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public static javax.swing.Box create​(java.lang.String commodityName, boolean tradeType, java.awt.Color commodityColour, int numUnits, int priceCreditsPerUnit)
      ActiveTrade.create(): The method call to construct the GUI appearance and features for an ActiveTrade graphics component.
      Parameters:
      commodityName - The name of the commodity (as String) being parsed into the ActiveTrade graphics component.
      tradeType - The boolean variable that denotes whether to set the content as either a buy or sell option.
      commodityColour - The Color used for representing the commodity.
      numUnits - The number of units being sold / requested in the ActiveTrade being displayed.
      priceCreditsPerUnit - The unit selling / buy price (in credits).
      Returns:
      box The fully constructed ActiveTrade graphics, contained within a Box.
